name: Holiday Gem Match
description:
A Holiday Match 3 Game

Info:

Match 3 like colored gems together to get your gem count down to 0.

The counter on the left will tell you which gems to match for the level.

At the end of the level you get stars depending on how well you did.

Those stars you use to unlock new levels to make it to the end of the game.

Good luck, and have fun!  

Also if you get stuck hit the shuffle key under the counter to mix

up the gems. :)

Please feel free to leave a comment and let me know your thoughts. :)
